modName: Improved Eisen Armor - Purchasable - Craftable - Improvable
summary: Improvable, purchasable, craftable, light & heavy armor version of Eisen Armor from Invalidfate & NPR.
descriptionHtml:
== INFORMATION ==

PLEASE READ TROUBLESHOOTING SECTION IF YOU ARE HAVING ISSUES.

This mod is the same as Invalidfate\'s V1.1 Eisen Armor mod but contains features left out. This mod includes both heavy and light armor versions of Eisen armor. Heavy armor is based on ebony stats, light armor version based on glass stats. The armor is improvable at a workbench and craftable at a forge with ebony ingots (heavy) or with malachite (light) assuming you have the skill level and perk. It is also purchasable in Whiterun at the Warmaiden\'s Blacksmith shop regardless of level/perk. This armor also works with the Busty Eisen mod by Carrolj2 via the esp update download. If you like the mod please comment and endorse.

If you like this mod be sure to check out my other mods!
[url=file.php?id=5733]Dynasty Armor Mod[/url]

== VARIANTS==
[url=file.php?id=4391]Busty Eisen CBBE[/url]
[url=file.php?id=6055]Eisen Armor ReColor-Steel[/url]
When using the above variants, keep this mods esp and use their textures & meshes.
[url=file.php?id=4014]Eisen Armor Circlet Add-on[/url]

== FEATURES ==
Black & White versions
Heavy & Light armor
Improvable
Enchantable
Purchasable
Craftable (Smithable)
Compatible with Busty Esien mod by Carrolj2 via the esp update download

== COMING SOON ==
Chest rewards (Add to loot tables)
Circlet dragonbone helmet (see pics) + full armor bonus

== WHATS NEW ==
Version 2.0: Craftable and Light Armor version added.

Version 1.0: Improvable and purchasable Eisen Armor.

== HOW TO INSTALL ==

1. Download the full install for new installations of the Eisen Armor mod. If you already have Invalidfate\'s mod installed, the download the esp update only.

2. Extract the archive to your data folder (for example: D:\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data). 

3. Ensure that the armor_eisen.esp is checked in Skyrim launchers Data files, and then launch the game.

4. Three ways to obtain the armor:
     
a. Craftable via smithing at a forge. Must have ebony smithing perk for heavy armor and glass perk for light.

b. Purchase the armor form the Warmaiden\'s Blacksmith shop in Whiterun .

c. Open the console (using the tilde key [~]) and type \"help eisen 0\" (without quotes) and press enter. You will see the console output with the various IDs for the armor and should look like multiple lines of this: ARMO: (07000800) \'Eisen Dummy Boots\'. The ID inside the parentheses will not be the same for everyone. This ID can then be used to obtain the armor like this in the console (without quotes): \"player.additem 07000800 1\". Do this for every Eisen item you want.

player.additem XX000800 1 => Eisen Heavy Boots (invisible boots used to hide vanilla feet)
player.additem XX000801 1 => Black Heavy Eisen Cuirass
player.additem XX000802 1 => Black Heavy Eisen Gloves
player.additem XX000803 1 => White Heavy Eisen Cuirass
player.additem XX000804 1 => White Heavy Eisen Gloves

player.additem XX0008A0 1 => Eisen Light Boots (invisible boots used to hide vanilla feet)
player.additem XX0008A1 1 => Black Light Eisen Cuirass
player.additem XX0008A2 1 => Black Light Eisen Gloves
player.additem XX0008A3 1 => White Light Eisen Cuirass
player.additem XX0008A4 1 => White Light Eisen Gloves

==TROUBLESHOOTING==

1. If you update from version 1 to 2 their may be an warning while loading that says \"This save relies on content that is no longer present. Some objects may no longer be available. Continue Loading?\" This is perfectly normal and all your content will still be there. It is part of the update.

If you have any issues please post a comment or message me.

==LEGAL==

This work is NOT copyrighted and CAN be used, distributed, and modified by anyone at anytime to anywhere by myself and implicitly from the other authors. I support free software.

==CREDIT==

** All credits give to the original TES4 mod author NPR (and his open license) and Invalidfate for the port.

Glemtvapen - For testing with the Busty Eisen Armor Mod here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4391

Original Skyrim port link:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1779
Original TES4 mod link:
http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=36939

==MODS==
[url=file.php?id=5642]Eisen Armor Mod[/url]
[url=file.php?id=5733]Dynasty Armor Mod[/url]
author: Codecrackerx9 - Invalidfate - NPR
